text:
Booking.com - Software developer (willing to learn Perl)- Visa sponsored - Amsterdam

At Booking.com we believe that a good developer is a good developer no matter what technology is involved. We run one of the world's largest Perl websites, but we do not require Perl experience to apply â€“ only a willingness to learn, superior software craftsmanship, and commercial focus.

We are inviting CVs from candidates worldwide and can arrange a Visa in some weeks.

Apply here: http://goo.gl/5I34k6 If you want to know more about the job before applying, mail jan.bernhart AT booking.com
